description_for_human: Connect to Bloxs real estate software to query properties, tenants, contracts, and maintenance.
description_for_model:
This plugin allows you to query comprehensive information from the Bloxs real estate management platform via OData API (read-only access). Use this plugin to:

1. **Relations & Contacts**: Query tenants, persons, and property owners using getRelations, getPersons, getOwners. Get contact details with getRelationContactPersons, getRelationCommunicationForms.

2. **Real Estate Objects**: Get details about buildings, complexes, sections, and rental units using getRealEstateObjects, getBuildings, getComplexes, getSections, getUnits. Filter units by OccupationPercentage (< 1 means vacant). Get valuations with getPropertyValuationValues, installations with getInstallations, meters with getMeters.

3. **Contracts**: Access sales contracts (rent contracts) and purchase contracts. Use getSalesContracts, getCommercialRentContracts, getPurchaseContracts, getSalesContractLineItems, getFinancingContracts. Get indexation info with getIndexationMethods, getIndexationSeries.

4. **Maintenance**: View service tickets using getServiceTickets. Get categories with getServiceTicketProblemCategories, states with getServiceTicketStates, cost categories with getServiceTicketCostCategories.

5. **Finance**: Access invoices, journals, budgets using getSalesInvoices, getPurchaseInvoices, getJournals, getLedgerAccounts, getBudgets, getFinancialMutations, getOwnerSettlements, getTaxRates.

6. **Notes & Tasks**: Get notes attached to entities with getNotes. Get tasks with getTasks.

7. **Reports**: Get commercial overview with getCommercialOverview, control list with getControlList.

Important: many filter fields use tenant- and language-specific labels (e.g., Status/State/WorkflowState/CategoryName). Do not hardcode these values. Prefer lookup endpoints (like getServiceTicketStates) or first sample recent records ($top=10â€“20 with $select of the field) to discover valid values, then filter using the exact returned value(s).

All operations support OData query parameters: $filter, $select, $orderby, $top, $skip, $count, $expand.

This plugin is read-only and cannot create or modify any data.

functions.name: getPersons
functions.description: Get all persons (individuals, contact persons) with contact details

functions.name: getOwners
functions.description: Get property owners (each has their own financial administration)

functions.name: getRelationContactPersons
functions.description: Get contact persons linked to relations

functions.name: getRelationCommunicationForms
functions.description: Get communication methods (email, phone) for relations

functions.name: getOwnerBankAccounts
functions.description: Get bank accounts for property owners

functions.name: getRealEstateObjects
functions.description: Get all real estate objects (buildings, complexes, units)

functions.name: getComplexes
functions.description: Get complexes (collections of rental units under one roof)

functions.name: getSections
functions.description: Get sections (parts of buildings for cost allocation)

functions.name: getUnits
functions.description: Get rental units. Use $filter=OccupationPercentage lt 1 for vacant units.

functions.name: getPropertyValuationValues
functions.description: Get property valuations (WOZ values, market values)

functions.name: getTheoreticalRentItems
functions.description: Get theoretical rent amounts for properties

functions.name: getTeamMembers
functions.description: Get team members assigned to properties

functions.name: getSalesContractLineItems
functions.description: Get line items from sales contracts

functions.name: getSalesContractRealestateObjects
functions.description: Get properties linked to sales contracts

functions.name: getServiceTicketProblemCategories
functions.description: Get problem categories for service tickets

functions.name: getServiceTicketCostCategories
functions.description: Get cost categories for maintenance tickets

functions.name: getSalesInvoices
functions.description: Get sales invoices (rent invoices to tenants)

functions.name: getSalesInvoiceLines
functions.description: Get line items from sales invoices

functions.name: getPurchaseInvoiceLines
functions.description: Get line items from purchase invoices

functions.name: getNotes
functions.description: Get notes attached to entities (persons, organisations, properties)
